Row.Text: The New World is a vast beautiful pristine natural wilderness.[NEWLINE]You score victory points for preserving that beautiy and cultural heritage. Specifically:[NEWLINE]1. Environment: 5VP for each unimproved rainforest, forest and marsh tile.[NEWLINE]2. Monuments: 50VP for each National Park.[NEWLINE]3. Archaeology: 100VP for each artifact excavated from archaeology.
